mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMMENT_DETAIL ORDER BY CC_ID, LINE

insert.foreach: INTO COMMENT_DETAIL (CC_ID, LINE, ORIGIN, CONTENT) VALUES (#{cc_seq}, #{item.line}, TRIM(#{item.origin}), TRIM(#{item.content}))

mapper.select: SELECT C.*, U.NAME, D.LINE, D.CONTENT, D.ORIGIN, #{idx} AS IDX FROM USERS U, COMMENTC C, COMMENT_DETAIL D WHERE U.USER_ID=C.USER_ID AND C.CC_ID=D.CC_ID AND D.CC_ID = ( SELECT DISTINCT FIRST_VALUE(CC_ID) OVER(ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) AS CC_ID FROM COMMENTC WHERE FEED_ID=#{feed_id} AND USER_ID=#{user_id} ) ORDER BY LINE

SELECT CC_ID, FEED_ID, USER_ID, REG_DATE, #{idx} AS IDX FROM COMMENTC WHERE CC_ID = ( SELECT DISTINCT FIRST_VALUE(CC_ID) OVER(ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC) AS CC_ID FROM COMMENTC WHERE FEED_ID=#{feed_id} AND USER_ID=#{user_id} )
